data.message:
I used to classify this advert as "christmas is just around the corner" now its just too early for me ...id understand if it was from the last 2 or 3 days before december to give us a little wake up call, but it feels like im being awoken for school on a saturday ... Too early ... But i do see it as a way to prepare for people's over hyped stressed out state of nervous excitement... So its not all bad.

Oh and to the people moaning that the Santa doesnt wink and have a sip of his Coka Cola this year ... He hasnt for a long time for at least 5 or 6 years now ...
